text: "One Way Love" is a song by Swedish singer, Agnetha Fältskog. It was released as a single in 1985, taken from her eighth solo-album Eyes of a Woman.One Way Love (Agnetha Fältskog song) swedishcharts.com. Retrieved January 14, 2016 The song was written by Jeff Lynne and produced by Eric Stewart.One Way Love (Agnetha Fältskog song) ultratop.be. Retrieved January 14, 2016 The song was the second single to be released from the album and the opening track on the album itself.Agnetha Fältskog - One Way Love (Single/Album Version) Jeff Lynne Song Database. Retrieved January 14, 2016 A video was produced, featuring a 1950s tone, in line with the upbeat and somewhat retro feel of the song. Jane Esterzhas also recorded a Spanish-language version with vocals by Delana Borges that was mildly well received. ==References== Category:1985 singles Category:Agnetha Fältskog songs Category:Songs written by Jeff Lynne Category:Song recordings produced by Eric Stewart Category:1985 songs Category:Polar Music singles
title: One Way Love (Agnetha Fältskog song)
